description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. I hope you are ready for a real math challenge. Space Math may seem like a simple space shooter at first, but once you start playing you won't be able to put it down. Solve the math problem and shoot the correct alien ship. This game includes exciting game play and a high score.
description.short: I hope you are ready for a real math challenge. Space Math may seem like a simple space shooter at first, but once you start playing you won't be able to put it down. Solve the math problem and shoot the correct alien ship. This game includes exciting game play and a high score.
